code: import axios from'axios';export var register=function register(data){return axios.post("/register",data);};export var login=function login(data){return axios.post("/login",data);};export var logout=function logout(){return axios.get("/logout");};export var createQuizz=function createQuizz(data){return axios.post("/createQuizz",data);};export var getQuizz=function getQuizz(){return axios.get("/getQuizzes");};export var getQuizzDetails=function getQuizzDetails(id){return axios.get("/quizz/".concat(id));};
